data.text: @CDPHE When the truth comes out you can't unvax your kids 🕳🐇 https://t.co/wx5iF6ROOW

Add me, I'm real and need to see clear. 

#Anonymous

Maslow will not be proved wrong in the eyes of history the way that will will be if we do not adequately address the crises that face all of our people together.

@CDPHE This is true. If you've had a positive exposure you should isolate 5 days then test. If the test is positive you should quarantine until symptoms stop. We should all be masking and distancing in public spaces now to help avoid the next wave. This isn't over.
